title: Real Time Emotion-Detection
description: A Python project using Machine learning and OpenCV to accurately detect and classify human emotions in real time.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A responsive web portfolio built with React and Vite to showcase projects, skills, and experience with a clean, modern UI and smooth animations.

title: LeetMetrics
description: A web app using the LeetCode API to display user stats by problem difficulty, offering clear insights into coding performance.

title: Netflix Clone
description: A responsive front-end replica of Netflix built using HTML and CSS, featuring a modern layout, navigation, and visually appealing design.
